website_summaries.verdict: The best food for a healthy, well-rounded diet.
pros: Food is free of artificial colors and flavors
Filled with all of the vitamins and minerals required for a healthy turtle diet
Pellets float and don’t cloud the tank
Suitable for turtles at any stage of life
cons: Hard pellets take a long time to soften in the water

customer_reviews.title: Gross!! poultry by-product meal in turtle food
customer_reviews.text: I’m very disappointed by the ingredients of this food when this company claims to sell high quality food. I care about feeding my turtle a healthy and natural diet and this food is filled with unnatural and filler ingredients. The 2nd ingredient is Ground Corn. The 4th ingredient is Poultry by-product meal. That means they are eating random body parts and guts of animals. I’m pretty sure in the wild turtles do not eat cow, chicken or pig body parts. I will continue to search for a healthier turtle food. I feed my turtle a variety of green vegetables and I’m looking to add a little bit more variety to his diet.
customer_reviews.author: Juliet

customer_reviews.title: unfortunately, didn’t work for us
customer_reviews.text: Turtle tried to eat it, he wasn’t feeling it after I left it in there for 15 mins before removing whatever he didn’t want to eat. I remove the food and give him something else. The next day when I went to feed him the tank had very mucky water. I had just cleaned and refreshed the tank three days prior so it shouldn’t have gotten mucky from food. Anyways, we won’t be purchasing again for our turtle. My turtle dislikes this product. My turtle of 20 years never turns down food.
customer_reviews.author: Maggie Jean

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and highly palatable
customer_reviews.text: I've been using Mazuri products for years for my reptiles and recommending them to clients for their own animals. I'd always had to order it in to the local Purina dealer in 25-lb bags. Finding a small bag for my small group of aquatic turtles was awesome! This food is well-received by all my different turtles, from sliders to mud turtles to Malaysian box turtles. I do still supplement with greens and the occasional fruit treat just for variety. Definitely a winner, in my book.
customer_reviews.author: Jennie E.

customer_reviews.title: Great nums for turtle tums
customer_reviews.text: My turtles love it. I have one common snapping turtle and a red earred slider. It does break up a bit because turtles are messy eaters, but it doesn't change the water colors like other foods I've tried.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Our turtle says yes
customer_reviews.text: Our turtle loves these and some internet searching pointed to these as being one of the healthier options. The only better options are the frozen packages you get at some pet stores and making the food yourself: I still do both of those but we add these so that there is variety.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Bier

customer_reviews.title: Does soften in water fast enough
customer_reviews.text: My turtles did not particularly like it. Real problem is that it stays hard way too long in the water. Would recommend Omega One Turtle food over this. Would not reorder.
customer_reviews.author: John in NYC

customer_reviews.title: It's fun to watch him swim around and hunt down all ...
customer_reviews.text: My turtle likes it. It's fun to watch him swim around and hunt down all the pellets. He is an old red eared slider so he gets lettuce every day and pellets every other day.
customer_reviews.author: mermaiden

customer_reviews.title: My favorite turtle food
customer_reviews.text: My turtles actually get spoiled and will only eat this after they've had it. It's nuts. Good stuff!
customer_reviews.author: Count Scotula

customer_reviews.title: Best turtle food
customer_reviews.text: This is the best food and my turtle loves it. Her eyes, skin and shell look fantastic thanks to this food that includes everything she needs for her diet to live 30 more years.
customer_reviews.author: TG

customer_reviews.title: Great natural turtle food
customer_reviews.text: This is the only food we buy for our turtle. We did some homework and found that this is one of the better natural foods. Will Buy again for sure. And the turtle likes it!
customer_reviews.author: LoriPS

customer_reviews.title: My turtle ate it!
customer_reviews.text: Scuba Squirt has a selective taste, he rarely likes something new and when I dropped these into his tank he ate them!
customer_reviews.author: Hugo

customer_reviews.title: Turtle loves it
customer_reviews.text: So good even the dog stole the bag and ripped it open.
customer_reviews.author: V. Turano

customer_reviews.title: Great! Much better than previous food
customer_reviews.text: My turtle seems to like it and the ingredient list was eye opening compared to the Reptomin I had been using. It's harder for her to get the pellets since they're much smaller and don't really stick to the tank walls like the long pellets, though.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Brewer

customer_reviews.title: not my turtle
customer_reviews.text: my yellow slider won't touch it, but she won't eat greens either.
customer_reviews.author: Luke Gabin

customer_reviews.title: Only one she liked was ZooMed
customer_reviews.text: She loves them! Cam is such a picky eater, I’ve tried so many foods. Only one she liked was ZooMed, but I noticed she was gaining some extra flab...(yes I was feeding every other day and the appropriate amount). I will be buying this from now on :)
customer_reviews.author: Megan Zkiab

customer_reviews.title: the turtles loved them. Great buy
customer_reviews.text: My baby turtles wasn’t eating my normal pellets. Spit it out right away. I bought Mazuri and crushed it up, the turtles loved them. Great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Tien

customer_reviews.title: Awesome pellet diet
customer_reviews.text: High quality turtle pellets. Recommend to everyone over the pellets filled with dyes and additives.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: My Yellow-Bellied Slider Loves his Mazuri Turtle food for aquatic turtles
customer_reviews.text: Product was recommended by my Vet. Arrived in 3 days and turtle loves it. Very satisfied with it.
customer_reviews.author: Tom in Atl

customer_reviews.title: Finicky eaters
customer_reviews.text: Turtles did not care for food, would not eat and ended up having to scoop food out after 3 days.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Calvert

customer_reviews.title: Larry, Moe & Curly LOVE IT!!!
customer_reviews.text: My three turtles really like this food along with the other food I give them. It seems to help the one turtle use his leg again after the swelling went down. Will purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Cookiecat51

customer_reviews.title: I did some research and this appeared to be one of the best products available
customer_reviews.text: My painted turtle loves this food. I did some research and this appeared to be one of the best products available, no artificial ingredients with all of the nutrients he needs. Will purchase this again.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Red ear sliders love it and less waste than stick food
customer_reviews.author: brett

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: My western pained turtles loves this food. Took one day for one of my turtle who’s is a pinky eater to go for it.. so I’m happy!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality food
customer_reviews.text: My diamondback terrapin loves these!! Bag normally lasts us about 2 months
customer_reviews.author: Maddison

customer_reviews.title: Yummy
customer_reviews.text: Our red earred sliders live these! I wish they came in a smaller bag though.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Raddatz

customer_reviews.title: This diet has complete nutritional benefits!
customer_reviews.text: My turtle has been eating this diet for a long time:-)
customer_reviews.author: V

customer_reviews.title: he's a very happy camper!
customer_reviews.text: My red ear slider will ONLY eat this particular turtle food. One of these bags last him over a month, a little per day or every other day (about a medicine cap full) along with proteins/fruits and or veggies...he's a very happy camper! :) Thanks Mazuri
customer_reviews.author: Jody Boss

customer_reviews.title: ... feeding this to my turtles for years and they love it!
customer_reviews.text: Have been feeding this to my turtles for years and they love it!
customer_reviews.author: ExBamaGal

customer_reviews.title: aquatic Turtle food
customer_reviews.text: This formula was recommended to me by my veterinarian and she loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Pandora Kilgore

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality Food
customer_reviews.text: My red eared sliders love this food! Does seem to muck up there water and like the sticks.
customer_reviews.author: Autumnreign1967

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: My turtles love it. It is a much higher quality food than I have found at my local pet store.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne O.

customer_reviews.title: the food itself
customer_reviews.text: I've been told by a turtle vet that this is the best food for my turtle.
customer_reviews.author: Kay C

customer_reviews.title: Best food quality
customer_reviews.text: My Tortie loves this!. I find soaking it for a few minutes before feeding makes it easier for my turtle to swallow it since he eats it up in minutes!. He can’t get enough of it!. Will certainty keep him on this higher quality food product!.
customer_reviews.author: NC Ramirez

customer_reviews.title: ... brand of food after a manufacturer discontinued his longtime favorite. Thankfully
customer_reviews.text: My turtle of 35 years would not eat any brand of food after a manufacturer discontinued his longtime favorite. Thankfully, I found this product in a local pet store and my turtle loves it!! Thank you Mazuri for saving the day!
customer_reviews.author: Awesome

product_meta.title: Mazuri Aquatic Turtle Diet
product_meta.description: Size:12 OZMazuri Aquatic Turtle Diet is a complete turtle food for freshwater turtles, such as painted and red-eared turtles, at all stages of life. This floating pellet turtle food is designed to be tossed into the water to encourage animals to come to the surface for feeding. With high levels of fish and animal protein, this turtle diet meets the needs of carnivorous species.
feature_bullets: Complete life cycle turtle food diet
Nutritionally complete turtle food - no vitamin or mineral supplements required
Floating diet, for natural feeding behavior
High level of fish and animal protein - Meets the needs of carnivorous species
